channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [HIRECT] Hind Rectifiers Ltd Announces Bonus Issue, Investment in Subsidiary, and Grant of Employee Stock Options
item.description:
Hind Rectifiers Ltd has announced a bonus issue of equity shares in the ratio of 1:1. The company also approved an investment of â‚¹ 90,00,000 in Coincade Studio Private Limited, a subsidiary, and granted 1,00,000 employee stock options under the Hirect Employees Stock Option Plan 2018. The company is also evaluating options for acquisition to facilitate global business expansion.

item.title: [SVCIND] SVC Industries Approves Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 2025
item.description:
SVC Industries Ltd. has approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31st December, 2025. The board of directors held a meeting on 11th February, 2026, where they considered and approved the financial results and the independent auditor's review report. The company's revenue from operations, including lease rent income and agri product sales, is reported in the statement of unaudited financial results.

  • SVC Industries approves unaudited financial results for Q3 2025
  • Revenue from operations, lease rent income, and agri product sales reported
  • Board of directors held a meeting on 11th February, 2026
  • Independent auditor's review report submitted
  • Company is in negotiations for settlement of financial liabilities towards outstanding debenture holders

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SVC INDUSTRIES Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [SPYL] Shekhawati Industries Ltd. Cancels Proposed Investment in Shekhawati & Shubhraj Developers LLP
item.description:
Shekhawati Industries Ltd. has announced that it will not proceed with its proposed investment in Shekhawati & Shubhraj Developers LLP. This decision was made following a Board Meeting and is in compliance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • Shekhawati Industries Ltd. has decided not to proceed with a proposed investment in Shekhawati & Shubhraj Developers LLP.
  • The decision was made following a Board Meeting.
  • The company was scheduled to subscribe as a partner in the LLP.
  • This announcement is in compliance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SHEKHAWATI POLY-YARN LTD. | Category: Investment

item.title: [BIL] Bhartiya International Ltd. Approves Unaudited Financial Results for Quarter and Nine Months Ended 31st December, 2025
item.description:
Bhartiya International Ltd. held a board meeting on 11th February, 2026, where they approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2025. The review was conducted by A S Poddar & Associates, who found no material misstatements in the standalone and consolidated financial results. The company operates in the Fashion Apparels and Accessories including Intermediaries segment. The financial results have been prepared in accordance with the Indian Accounting Standards and other recognized accounting practices.

  • Bhartiya International Ltd. approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2025.
  • The review was conducted by A S Poddar & Associates, who found no material misstatements in the standalone and consolidated financial results.
  • The company operates in the Fashion Apparels and Accessories including Intermediaries segment.
  • The financial results have been prepared in accordance with the Indian Accounting Standards and other recognized accounting practices.
  • The company has recognized the financial impact arising from the implementation of the New Labour Codes, which is not material.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: BHARTIYA INTERNATIONAL LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [FLEXITUFF] Flexituff Ventures International Ltd to Approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q4 2025 in February 2026 Board Meeting
item.description:
Flexituff Ventures International Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on 14th February, 2026, to consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December, 2025, along with the Limited Review Report. The meeting is in accordance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, and the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, as amended. The trading window for all Directors, Key Managerial Personnel, Designated Employees, and other connected persons has been closed from 1st January, 2026, and will reopen 48 hours after the declaration and publication of the financial results.

  • Flexituff Ventures International Ltd to consider and approve Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for Q4 2025.
  • Board Meeting scheduled on 14th February, 2026.
  • Trading window closed for Directors, Key Managerial Personnel, Designated Employees, and other connected persons from 1st January, 2026.
  • Trading window to reopen 48 hours after the declaration and publication of financial results.
  • Meeting in accordance with SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, and SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, as amended.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Flexituff Ventures International Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [LTIM] LTIMindtree Ltd Rebrands as LTM Limited, Unveils New Identity as 'Business Creativity Partner'
item.description:
LTIMindtree Ltd, a Larsen & Toubro Group Company, has announced a significant milestone in its journey. Effective February 11, 2026, the company's brand name transitions from LTIMindtree to LTM. This change reflects the company's evolution into a global powerhouse and its commitment to driving business creativity and transformative impact for its clients. The new identity is part of a broader strategic shift to align with the company's aspirations and reinforce its commitment to its clients. The Board of Directors has also approved a proposal to change the company's legal name from LTIMindtree Limited to LTM Limited, subject to shareholder approval and regulatory clearances.

  • LTIMindtree Ltd transitions to a new brand name, LTM, effective February 11, 2026.
  • The new brand identity reflects the company's evolution into a global powerhouse.
  • The change is part of a broader strategic shift to align with the company's aspirations and commitment to its clients.
  • The Board of Directors has approved a proposal to change the company's legal name to LTM Limited, subject to approvals and clearances.
  • The new identity signifies LTM's role as the 'Business Creativity Partner'.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: LTIMindtree Ltd | Category: Rebranding

item.title: [ADVAIT] Advait Energy Transitions Ltd Announces Q3 and Nine Months Unaudited Financial Results for 2025
item.description:
Advait Energy Transitions Ltd (Formerly known as Advait Infratech Limited) announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025. The results were reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on February 11, 2026. The company's material subsidiary, Advait Greenergy Private Limited, is exploring options for fund raising of approximately Rs 90 Crores from various investors for its future capex purpose.

  • Advait Energy Transitions Ltd announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025.
  • The results were reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on February 11, 2026.
  • The company's material subsidiary, Advait Greenergy Private Limited, is exploring options for fund raising of approximately Rs 90 Crores from various investors for its future capex purpose.

Company: Advait Infratech Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [HARLETH] Haryana Leather Chemicals Reports Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025
item.description:
Haryana Leather Chemicals Ltd. has released its un-audited standalone financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2025. The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their respective meetings. The company's revenue from operations for the nine months ended at Rs. 3664.21 crores, with a net profit after tax of Rs. 54.89 crores. The results are in accordance with the Indian Accounting Standards (Ind AS) and other accounting principles generally accepted in India.

  • Revenue from operations for the nine months ended at Rs. 3664.21 crores
  • Net profit after tax for the nine months ended at Rs. 54.89 crores
  • Results reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors
  • In accordance with the Indian Accounting Standards (Ind AS)

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: HARYANA LEATHER CHEMICALS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [VICEROY] Viceroy Hotels Poised for Strong Growth with 50% Y-o-Y PAT Surge and Marriott Executive Apartments Acquisition
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Viceroy Hotels Limited, a leading leisure hospitality provider in India, announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2025. The company reported a Y-o-Y increase in revenue from EBITDA, PBT, and PAT, showcasing strong cost discipline, operating leverage, and resilient profitability despite renovation disruptions. A significant development in Q3 FY26 was the acquisition of Marriott Executive Apartments at SLN Terminus, Gachibowli, Hyderabad, for 215 crores. This strategic expansion is expected to provide earnings visibility and reinforce a sustainable growth trajectory. Viceroy Hotels aims to expand to 1,000 keys by 2030, focusing on various sectors, including business, leisure, luxury, and destination travel.

  • Q3 FY26 EBITDA rose to 12.09 crores with margins at 31.5%, while PAT surged 50% year-on-year to 10.93 crores with margins at 28.5%.
  • Acquisition of Marriott Executive Apartments at SLN Terminus, Gachibowli, Hyderabad for a consideration of 215 crores.
  • Earnings visibility expected to begin in Q4 FY26, reinforcing a sustainable growth trajectory.
  • Viceroy Hotels aims to expand to 1,000 keys by 2030.
  • Strong cost discipline, operating leverage, and resilient profitability despite renovation disruptions.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: VICEROY HOTELS LTD. | Category: Acquisitions

item.title: [ARMAN] Arun Gada & PACs Dispose Equity Shares in Arman Holdings Ltd - SEBI Disclosure
item.description:
Arun Gada and Persons Acting in Concert (PACs) have disclosed the disposal of equity shares in Arman Holdings Limited as per Regulation 29(2) of SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations, 2011. The disposal took place in the open market, and the details of the acquisition and sale are provided in the disclosure. The total holding of Arun Gada and PACs after the sale is 5.91% of the total equity shares of Arman Holdings Ltd.

  • Arun Gada and PACs disposed of equity shares in Arman Holdings Ltd
  • Disclosure made under Regulation 29(2) of SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations, 2011
  • Disposal took place in the open market
  • Arun Gada and PACs hold 5.91% of the total equity shares after the sale

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Arman Holdings Ltd | Category: Disposal of Shares
